00035 #define ToString(var, arg) \
00036   { \
00037     stringstream sstr; \
00038     sstr << arg; \
00039     sstr >> var; \
00040   }

00044 #define N_BIT_MASK(N)                   ((0x1ULL << (N)) - 1)
00045 #define N_BIT_MASK_64                   (0xffffffffffffffffULL)
00046 #define N_BIT_MASK(N)                    ((0x1ULL << (N)) - 1)

00048 #define MIN2(v0, v1)                    (((v0) < (v1)) ? (v0) : (v1))
00049 #define MAX2(v0, v1)                    (((v0) > (v1)) ? (v0) : (v1))

00082 template <class T>
00083 class pool_c
00084 {
00085   public:
00089     pool_c()
00090     {
00091       m_pool            = new list<T*>;
00092       m_poolsize        = 0;
00093       m_poolexpand_unit = 1;
00094       m_name            = "none";
00095     }
00096 
00102     pool_c(int pool_expand_unit, string name)
00103     {
00104       m_pool            = new list<T*>;
00105       m_poolsize        = 0;
00106       m_poolexpand_unit = pool_expand_unit;
00107       m_name            = name;
00108     }
00109 
00113     ~pool_c()
00114     {
00115       while (!m_pool->empty()) {
00116         T* entry = m_pool->front();
00117         m_pool->pop_front();
00118         delete entry;
00119       }
00120       delete m_pool;
00121     }
00122 
00126     T* acquire_entry(void)
00127     {
00128       if (m_pool->empty()) {
00129         expand_pool();
00130       }
00131       T* entry = m_pool->front();
00132       m_pool->pop_front();
00133       return entry;
00134     }
00135     
00140     T* acquire_entry(macsim_c* m_simBase) 
00141     {
00142       if (m_pool->empty()) {
00143         expand_pool(m_simBase);
00144       }
00145       T* entry = m_pool->front();
00146       m_pool->pop_front();
00147       return entry;
00148     }
00149 
00153     void release_entry(T* entry)
00154     {
00155       m_pool->push_front(entry);
00156     }
00157 
00161     void expand_pool(void)
00162     {
00163 //      cout << m_name << " expand pool\n";
00164       for (int ii = 0; ii < m_poolexpand_unit; ++ii) {
00165         T* entries = new T;
00166         m_pool->push_back(entries);
00167       }
00168       m_poolsize += m_poolexpand_unit;
00169     }
00170 
00175     void expand_pool(macsim_c* m_simBase)
00176     {
00177 //      cout << m_name << " expand pool\n";
00178       for (int ii = 0; ii < m_poolexpand_unit; ++ii) {
00179         T* entries = new T(m_simBase);
00180         m_pool->push_back(entries);
00181       }
00182       m_poolsize += m_poolexpand_unit;
00183     }
00184 
00185     int size(void)
00186     {
00187       return m_poolsize; 
00188     }
00189 
00190   private:
00191     list<T*>* m_pool; 
00192     int       m_poolsize; 
00193     int       m_poolexpand_unit; 
00194     string    m_name; 
00195 };
00196

00201 template <typename T>
00202 class hash_c
00203 {
00204   public:
00208     hash_c() 
00209     {
00210       m_pool = new pool_c<T>(15, "hash");
00211     }
00212 
00217     hash_c(string name)
00218     {
00219       m_pool = new pool_c<T>(15, name);
00220     }
00221 
00226     hash_c(pool_c<T>* pool)
00227     {
00228       m_pool = pool;
00229     }
00230 
00234     ~hash_c()
00235     {
00236       clear();
00237       delete m_pool;
00238     }
00239 
00244     T* hash_table_access_create(int64 key, bool* new_entry, macsim_c* simBase)
00245     {
00246       T* result;
00247       if (m_table.find(key) == m_table.end()) {
00248         result = m_pool->acquire_entry(simBase);
00249         m_table.insert(pair<int64, T*>(key, result));
00250         *new_entry = true;
00251       }
00252       else {
00253         result = m_table[key];
00254         *new_entry = false;
00255       }
00256 
00257       return result;
00258     }
00259 
00263     T* hash_table_access_create(int64 key, bool* new_entry)
00264     {
00265       T* result;
00266       if (m_table.find(key) == m_table.end()) {
00267         result = m_pool->acquire_entry();
00268         m_table.insert(pair<int64, T*>(key, result));
00269         *new_entry = true;
00270       }
00271       else {
00272         result = m_table[key];
00273         *new_entry = false;
00274       }
00275 
00276       return result;
00277     }
00278 
00282     T* hash_table_access(int64 key)
00283     {
00284       if (m_table.find(key) == m_table.end()) {
00285         return NULL;
00286       }
00287       else {
00288         return m_table[key];
00289       }
00290     }
00291 
00295     bool hash_table_access_delete(int64 key)
00296     {
00297       if (m_table.find(key) == m_table.end()) {
00298         return false;
00299       }
00300       else {
00301         T* entry = m_table[key];
00302         m_table.erase(key);
00303         m_pool->release_entry(entry);
00304         return true;
00305       }
00306     }
00307 
00311     int size(void)
00312     {
00313       return m_table.size();
00314     }
00315 
00319     void clear(void)
00320     {
00321       while (!m_table.empty()) {
00322         T* entry = (*m_table.begin()).second;
00323         m_pool->release_entry(entry);
00324         m_table.erase(m_table.begin());
00325       }
00326       m_table.clear();
00327     }
00328 
00329   private:
00330     unordered_map<int64, T*> m_table; 
00331     pool_c<T>* m_pool; 
00332 };

00366   private:
